title: Collaborative Science Problem-Solving Course Based on Digital-Supported Blended Learning (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Theory Knowledge and Relevant Job Experience
context.additional_context: Professional learners participate via smartphones, emphasizing real-time discussions and collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative problem-solving processes with peers using digital tools at an engagement rate of 80% or higher.
Learners structure scientific arguments in an online environment and exchange peer feedback at least three times.
Learners develop two or more digital-face-to-face integrated teaching strategies based on blended learning design principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
